name: Wind-Up Smiley Face
description:
Up to "wind" the smiley face

Left to steer counterclockwise

Right to steer clockwise

Down to slow down when moving

collencgt pizaba

made for the low effort game jam btw

made in scratch because that speaks low effort to me cry about it

took a couple hours because scratch froze for 5-10 seconds every time I did so much as move a block
